enhanced_by.reason: The addAll method internally uses the add(E, int) method to add each element from the collection, making it a direct dependency for setting up the test.
The collectionBag method initializes the Bag object, which is necessary for setting up the test environment for addAll.
The containsAll method can be used to verify that all elements added by addAll are present in the Bag, ensuring the correctness of the addAll operation.
The removeAll method can be used to clean up the Bag after the test, ensuring that the Bag state is restored to its original condition.
